Text:
I have just bought a Wii and a complete novice when it comes to downloading your torrent for example, and using it in my Wii.

Do I download and burn to a DVD disc or is it more complex than that?

Any help would be much appreciated, in return I will definitely seed for a total of 4x.

Thanks.
gHighway, the wii needs to be modded either software (homebrew) or with a chip to play your backup games. Google it.
